value.desc: Model of the component; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'input' event) OR use v-model directive

options.desc: Array of Objects defining each option

label.desc: Label of option button; Use this prop and/or 'icon', but at least one is required

icon.desc: Icon of option button; Use this prop and/or 'label', but at least one is required

value.desc: Value of the option that will be used by component model

slot.desc: Slot name to use for this button content; Useful for customizing content or even add tooltips

...props.desc: Any other QBtn props (including class and style)

spread.desc: Spread horizontally to all available space

rounded.desc: Applies a more prominent border-radius for a squared shape button

size.desc: Button size name or a CSS unit including unit name

no-caps.desc: Avoid turning label text into caps (which happens by default)

stack.desc: Stack icon and label vertically instead of on same line (like it is by default)

stretch.desc: When used on flexbox parent, button will stretch to parent's height

clearable.desc: Clears model on click of the already selected button

clear.desc: When using the 'clearable' property, this event is emitted when the already selected button is clicked
